mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_profiles ( user_id, profile_image_url, bio, total_posts, total_contests_entered, best_rank ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{bio}, #{totalPosts}, #{totalContestsEntered}, #{bestRank} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, profile_image_url, bio, total_posts, total_contests_entered, best_rank, created_at, updated_at FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_profiles SET profile_image_url = #{profileImageUrl}, bio = #{bio}, total_posts = #{totalPosts}, total_contests_entered = #{totalContestsEntered}, best_rank = #{bestRank}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}

UPDATE user_profiles up SET best_rank = sub.final_rank, updated_at = now() FROM ( SELECT uph.user_id, cr.final_rank FROM contest_results cr JOIN user_photos uph ON cr.photo_id = uph.id WHERE cr.contest_id = #{contestId} ) AS sub WHERE up.user_id = sub.user_id AND ( up.best_rank IS NULL OR up.best_rank = 0 OR sub.final_rank < up.best_rank )
UPDATE user_profiles SET total_posts = total_posts + 1, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE user_profiles SET total_posts = CASE WHEN total_posts > 0 THEN total_posts - 1 ELSE 0 END, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
